question.text:
The magnetic field of an electromagnetic wave is given by:
B→=1.6×10-6cos⁡ 2×107z+6×1015t 2i^+j^Wbm2 
The associated electric field will be:

options.text: <math><mover accent="true"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">E</mi></mrow><mo>→</mo></mover><mo>=</mo><mn>4.8</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">o</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mfenced separators="|"><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>7</mn></mrow></msup><mi>z</mi><mo>-</mo><mn>6</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>15</mn></mrow></msup><mi>t</mi></mrow></mfenced><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mfenced separators="|"><mrow><mo>-</mo><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mover accent="true"><mrow><mi>j</mi></mrow><mo>^</mo></mover><mo>+</mo><mover accent="true"><mrow><mi>i</mi></mrow><mo>^</mo></mover></mrow></mfenced><mfrac><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">V</mi></mrow><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi></mrow></mfrac><mi> </mi></math>

<math><mover accent="true"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">E</mi></mrow><mo>→</mo></mover><mo>=</mo><mn>4.8</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">o</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mfenced separators="|"><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>7</mn></mrow></msup><mi>z</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>6</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>15</mn></mrow></msup><mi>t</mi></mrow></mfenced><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mfenced separators="|"><mrow><mover accent="true"><mrow><mi>i</mi></mrow><mo>^</mo></mover><mo>-</mo><mn>2</mn><mi> </mi><mover accent="true"><mrow><mi>j</mi></mrow><mo>^</mo></mover></mrow></mfenced><mfrac><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">V</mi></mrow><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi></mrow></mfrac></math>

<math><mover accent="true"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">E</mi></mrow><mo>→</mo></mover><mo>=</mo><mn>4.8</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">o</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mfenced separators="|"><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>7</mn></mrow></msup><mi>z</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>6</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>15</mn></mrow></msup><mi>t</mi></mrow></mfenced><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mfenced separators="|"><mrow><mo>-</mo><mover accent="true"><mrow><mi>i</mi></mrow><mo>^</mo></mover><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mover accent="true"><mrow><mi>j</mi></mrow><mo>^</mo></mover></mrow></mfenced><mfrac><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">V</mi></mrow><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi></mrow></mfrac></math>

<math><mover accent="true"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">E</mi></mrow><mo>→</mo></mover><mo>=</mo><mn>4.8</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">o</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mfenced separators="|"><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>7</mn></mrow></msup><mi>z</mi><mo>-</mo><mn>6</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>15</mn></mrow></msup><mi>t</mi></mrow></mfenced><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mfenced separators="|"><mrow><mn>2</mn><mover accent="true"><mrow><mi>i</mi></mrow><mo>^</mo></mover><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mover accent="true"><mrow><mi>j</mi></mrow><mo>^</mo></mover></mrow></mfenced><mfrac><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">V</mi></mrow><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi></mrow></mfrac></math>

solution.text:
Given magnetic field, B→=1.6×10-6cos2×107z+6×1015t2i^+j^Wbm2
The relation between magnetic field and electric field is E=cB=(3×108)×(1.6×10-6×5)=4.8×102×5
The direction of light propagation will be along E→×B→ .
E→=4.8×102cos2×107z+6×1015t-i^+2j^Vm
